thread.title: The Crypto Crime Wave Is Here

author: Corinne Ramey
title: The Crypto Crime Wave Is Here
text:
On a Saturday afternoon in November, Louis Meza made plans to meet a friend and fellow cryptocurrency enthusiast for drinks at Ruby Tuesday in New York City’s Times Square. “We’re going to have a great time,” Meza said in a text. “And by the way, I’m putting you in an Uber car at the end of the night.”
A former salesman at the food-delivery service Grubhub, Meza is described by friends as gregarious and courteous—a 35-year-old poker buff with an entrepreneurial streak and an appetite for risk. The two men had known each other... RELATED VIDEO Bitcoin 101: What It Is, How to Invest The virtual currency bitcoin continues surging to new highs as a frenzy of investors get in on the action. WSJ's Paul Vigna explains what you need to know, and how to invest should you want to join the mania. Photo: Alexander Hotz/The Wall Street Journal.
